params._query:
DECLARE @PageNumber INT = '1'
				,@PageSize INT = '10'
				
		select a.TMPLT_NO as tmpltNo
				, a.TMPLT_NM as tmpltNm
				, a.SAMPLE_HTML as sampleHtml
				, a.SAMPLE_IMG as sampleImg
				, a.TMPLT_DESC as tmpltDesc
				, a.REG_ID as regId
				,em1.Staff_Name as regNm
				, convert(varchar(16), a.REG_DT, 120) as regDt
				, a.REG_ID as modId
				,em2.Staff_Name as modNm
				, convert(varchar(16), a.REG_DT, 120) as modDt
				, a.DEL_YN as delYn
				, a.DEL_ID as delId
				,em3.Staff_Name as delNm
				, convert(varchar(16), a.DEL_DT, 120) as delDt
				, case when exists (
					select top 1 a1.TMPLT_NO
					from IBM_BANNER As a1 with(nolock)
					where 1=1
					and a1.TMPLT_NO = a.TMPLT_NO
				) then 'Y' else 'N' end useYn
		from IBM_TEMPLATE As a with(nolock)
			 left outer join EDUWILL_MEMBER As em1 with(nolock) on (em1.Staff_ID = a.REG_ID)
			 left outer join EDUWILL_MEMBER As em2 with(nolock) on (em2.Staff_ID = a.MOD_ID)
			 left outer join EDUWILL_MEMBER As em3 with(nolock) on (em3.Staff_ID = a.DEL_ID)
		where 1=1
		 
			and DEL_YN = 'N'
		 
		 
		 
				order by a.REG_DT DESC
			 
		
		OFFSET @PageSize * (@PageNumber - 1) ROWS
		FETCH NEXT @PageSize ROWS ONLY

list._query:
DECLARE @P_TMPLT_NO int = '6'
		
		select a.CONTNT_TYPE_EXPSR_YN as contntTypeExpsrYn
				,a.CONTNT_TYPE_EXPSR_ITM as contntTypeExpsrItm
				,a.OVER_IMG_EXPSR_YN as overImgExpsrYn
				,a.OVER_IMG_EXPSR_ITM as overImgExpsrItm
				,a.COLOR_CD_EXPSR_YN as colorCdExpsrYn
				,a.DIM_EXPSR_YN as dimExpsrYn
				,a.DIM_EXPSR_ITM as dimExpsrItm
				,a.LINK_CNT_EXPSR_YN as linkCntExpsrYn
				,a.LINK_CNT_EXPSR_ITM as linkCntExpsrItm
				,a.END_TYPE_EXPSR_YN as endTypeExpsrYn
				,a.END_TYPE_EXPSR_ITM as endTypeExpsrItm
		from IBM_TEMPLATE_CONF As a with(nolock)
		where 1=1
		and a.TMPLT_NO = @P_TMPLT_NO

DECLARE @P_TMPLT_NO int = '5'
		
		select a.CONTNT_TYPE_EXPSR_YN as contntTypeExpsrYn
				,a.CONTNT_TYPE_EXPSR_ITM as contntTypeExpsrItm
				,a.OVER_IMG_EXPSR_YN as overImgExpsrYn
				,a.OVER_IMG_EXPSR_ITM as overImgExpsrItm
				,a.COLOR_CD_EXPSR_YN as colorCdExpsrYn
				,a.DIM_EXPSR_YN as dimExpsrYn
				,a.DIM_EXPSR_ITM as dimExpsrItm
				,a.LINK_CNT_EXPSR_YN as linkCntExpsrYn
				,a.LINK_CNT_EXPSR_ITM as linkCntExpsrItm
				,a.END_TYPE_EXPSR_YN as endTypeExpsrYn
				,a.END_TYPE_EXPSR_ITM as endTypeExpsrItm
		from IBM_TEMPLATE_CONF As a with(nolock)
		where 1=1
		and a.TMPLT_NO = @P_TMPLT_NO

DECLARE @P_TMPLT_NO int = '3'
		
		select a.CONTNT_TYPE_EXPSR_YN as contntTypeExpsrYn

				,a.COLOR_CD_EXPSR_YN as colorCdExpsrYn
				,a.DIM_EXPSR_YN as dimExpsrYn
				,a.DIM_EXPSR_ITM as dimExpsrItm
				,a.LINK_CNT_EXPSR_YN as linkCntExpsrYn
				,a.LINK_CNT_EXPSR_ITM as linkCntExpsrItm
				,a.END_TYPE_EXPSR_YN as endTypeExpsrYn
				,a.END_TYPE_EXPSR_ITM as endTypeExpsrItm
		from IBM_TEMPLATE_CONF As a with(nolock)
		where 1=1

DECLARE @P_TMPLT_NO int = '2'
		
		select a.CONTNT_TYPE_EXPSR_YN as contntTypeExpsrYn
				,a.CONTNT_TYPE_EXPSR_ITM as contntTypeExpsrItm
				,a.OVER_IMG_EXPSR_YN as overImgExpsrYn
				,a.OVER_IMG_EXPSR_ITM as overImgExpsrItm
				,a.COLOR_CD_EXPSR_YN as colorCdExpsrYn

				,a.LINK_CNT_EXPSR_YN as linkCntExpsrYn
				,a.LINK_CNT_EXPSR_ITM as linkCntExpsrItm
				,a.END_TYPE_EXPSR_YN as endTypeExpsrYn
				,a.END_TYPE_EXPSR_ITM as endTypeExpsrItm
		from IBM_TEMPLATE_CONF As a with(nolock)
		where 1=1
		and a.TMPLT_NO = @P_TMPLT_NO

DECLARE @P_TMPLT_NO int = '1'
		
		select a.CONTNT_TYPE_EXPSR_YN as contntTypeExpsrYn
				,a.CONTNT_TYPE_EXPSR_ITM as contntTypeExpsrItm
				,a.OVER_IMG_EXPSR_YN as overImgExpsrYn
				,a.OVER_IMG_EXPSR_ITM as overImgExpsrItm
				,a.COLOR_CD_EXPSR_YN as colorCdExpsrYn
				,a.DIM_EXPSR_YN as dimExpsrYn
				,a.DIM_EXPSR_ITM as dimExpsrItm
				,a.LINK_CNT_EXPSR_YN as linkCntExpsrYn
				,a.LINK_CNT_EXPSR_ITM as linkCntExpsrItm
				,a.END_TYPE_EXPSR_YN as endTypeExpsrYn
				,a.END_TYPE_EXPSR_ITM as endTypeExpsrItm
		from IBM_TEMPLATE_CONF As a with(nolock)
		where 1=1
		and a.TMPLT_NO = @P_TMPLT_NO
